scripts.build: npm run build:index && npm run build:internals
scripts.build:index: microbundle build -i index.js -o dist -f cjs --target web --jsx React.createElement
scripts.build:internals: microbundle build lib/App.js lib/html.js -o dist -f cjs --jsx React.createElement
scripts.watch:index: microbundle watch -i index.js -o dist -f cjs --target web --jsx React.createElement
scripts.watch:internals: microbundle watch lib/App.js lib/html.js -o dist -f cjs --jsx React.createElement
scripts.watch: npm run watch:index & npm run watch:internals
